name: Bauble Breakerz 3D
description:
50,000 Ornaments used to hang here, now it's a ghost tree.

As the last line of defence against the Rogue Bauble Alliance - you stand together. 3 ornaments, united despite their differences: SNOWMAN-MAN, SANTABOI AND ELF PERSON. Equip your state-of-the-art AngelTek weaponry: Snowball Blaster, Bauble Launcher, and The Cannon of the Bells, then call upon your Christmas Angel and her LAZER ZAP to take out hoards of Rogue Ornaments at once!

Switch through the layers of the tree and mobilize your comrades to fend off the jealous enemies and save Christmas!

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click: Shoot
  • Numbers 1-4 :  Switch between ornaments
  • Q/E: Switch between ornaments
  • Esc: Pause
